channel.title: 474 server combat level help
channel.description:
I recently downloaded a server source, (474) and the combat tab said: 'Combat level: 0.' The guy who made the server posted to change the RSinterface to this:
"//addText(3983, "Combat Level", tda, 0, 0xff981f, false, true); rsi.totalChildren(2, 2, 2); rsi.child(0, 3983, 52, 25); //combat level rsi.child(1, 150, 21, 153); //auto retaliate"
and in client.java:
"int col = 0x3399ff; chatTextDrawingArea.method382(col, spriteDrawX, player.name, spriteDrawY-8, true);"
I did, now it does this:
I logged on to a lvl 69 and a lvl 126. The level 126 right clicked the lvl 69, it said lvl 69. But the combat tab for lvl 126 said 69. the lvl 69 right clicked lvl 126 and it said lvl 126, but his cb tab said 126.
Help would be awesome Thanks :D

item.title: 474 server combat level help
item.dc:creator: @zamorak12354 zamorak12354
item.description:
@zamorak12354 wrote:

I recently downloaded a server source, (474) and the combat tab said: ‘Combat level: 0.’ The guy who made the server posted to change the RSinterface to this:

“//addText(3983, “Combat Level”, tda, 0, 0xff981f, false, true);
rsi.totalChildren(2, 2, 2);
rsi.child(0, 3983, 52, 25); //combat level
rsi.child(1, 150, 21, 153); //auto retaliate”

and in client.java:

“int col = 0x3399ff;
chatTextDrawingArea.method382(col, spriteDrawX, player.name, spriteDrawY-8, true);”

I did, now it does this:

I logged on to a lvl 69 and a lvl 126. The level 126 right clicked the lvl 69, it said lvl 69. But the combat tab for lvl 126 said 69. the lvl 69 right clicked lvl 126 and it said lvl 126, but his cb tab said 126.

Help would be awesome
Thanks
